这可延伸到禁酒(teetotalism)与素食或纯素食主义饮食习惯。后两者也连接到尊重环境。
干草翻散机 tedder; hay conditioner无酒精饮料 teetotal drink铁氟龙 teflon

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: emphatic extension of total, apparently first used by Richard Turner, a worker from Preston, in a speech (1833) urging total abstinence from all alcohol, rather than mere abstinence from spirits, advocated by some early temperance reformers

entry.def: Someone who is teetotal does not drink alcohol.

example.ex: He will not be having a celebratory drink, as he is teetotal.
example.tran: 他滴酒不沾，不会喝庆功酒的。

means.word_mean: 1. practice teetotalism and abstain from the consuymption of alcoholic beverages
1. practicing complete abstinence from alcoholic beverages;

sentences.sentence: "no thank you; I happen to be teetotal"

auth_sentence.content: He himself had become a Muslim...but he was not...teetotal.
auth_sentence.res_content: He himself had become a Muslim...but he was not...teetotal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He himself had become a Muslim...but he was not...teetotal.

auth_sentence.content: We describe people as teetotal, and it means that they never drink alcohol.
auth_sentence.res_content: We describe people as teetotal, and it means that they never drink alcohol.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We describe people as teetotal, and it means that they never drink alcohol.

means.word_mean: 完全戒酒的,主张完全戒酒的

sentences.en: He won’t drink because he’s teetotal.
sentences.cn: 他不肯喝酒,因为他是滴酒不沾的。
